company_context: Identity & Fraud Prevention Platform for financial services | Alloy Meet the Alloy AI Assistant Learn more Menu Close Optimize growth while minimizing risk Alloy provides an end-to-end identity and fraud prevention platform that helps financial institutions and fintechs automate and manage their decisions for onboarding, ongoing fraud & AML monitoring, and credit underwriting. Schedule a Demo See How It Works Trusted by over 800 of the world’s top financial institutions and fintechs Building financial products has never been safer Alloy brings together the most innovative sources of risk intelligence to help financial institutions and fintechs optimize growth while minimizing risk. With configurable solutions for understanding a customer’s identity, fraud, compliance, and credit risk throughout the entire customer lifecycle, Alloy helps companies deliver great financial products to more customers around the world. Explore solutions Identity is central to solving fraud and compliance risk Fraud Move faster than the pace of fraud Fraud attempts and attacks are inevitable. It’s not about if it will happen, it’s about whether or not you are prepared. Alloy allows you to respond to any situation instantly and without engineering resources, future-proofing your risk tech stack. Learn more about fraud solutions Compliance Get compliant, stay compliant The global regulatory environment is increasingly complex. A set-it-and-forget-it approach to compliance no longer works. Alloy arms you with the expertise and tools to understand your regulatory requirements and stay compliant. Learn more about compliance solutions Onboarding Step up your onboarding Give your customers the fast and simple online account opening experience they deserve, while increasing conversions, reducing manual reviews, and preventing fraud. Alloy enables instant digital identity verification and document verification, all while meeting cross-border KYC, KYB, and AML requirements. Learn more about onboarding Ongoing Monitoring Monitor ongoing risks Combine information captured during onboarding with ongoing transaction and account activity to create an evolving customer risk profile enabling you to prevent fraud and remain compliant throughout the customer lifecycle. Learn more about ongoing monitoring Credit Underwriting Make smarter credit decisions Transform your credit policies into easy-to-use workflows that integrate with credit bureau and alternative underwriting data for a clearer picture of your customers. Learn more about credit underwriting Embedded Finance Manage embedded finance risk Sponsor banks are facing increasing pressure from regulators. Fintechs want to optimize beyond their sponsor banks’ KYC/AML and fraud processes so they can improve customer conversions. Alloy enables all ends of the embedded finance ecosystem to manage their shared risk together. Learn more about embedded finance risk management Alloy uses data orchestration to help banks and fintechs make bet

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: Hi, my name is Alex and I'm reaching out from DeepData AI. We're a data processing solution that helps financial institutions like yours optimize their identity and fraud prevention efforts. I came across Alloy and was impressed with the work you're doing in this space. Can you tell me a bit about your current data processing infrastructure?

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: (skeptical) Ah, another data processing solution. We're already invested in a few different tools, and to be honest, I'm not sure we're in the market for something new. What makes DeepData AI so special?

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: I completely understand your skepticism. Many of our clients were in similar situations before partnering with us. What sets us apart is our ability to integrate with existing systems, like Alloy, and provide real-time data processing and analytics. This enables our clients to make more informed decisions and stay ahead of potential fraud threats. We've seen significant reductions in false positives and manual review times with our current clients.

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: (concerned about integration) I see. Well, integration is a big concern for us. We've had issues with other solutions not playing nicely with our existing tech stack. How do you ensure seamless integration, and what kind of support do you offer?

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: That's a great question. Our team has extensive experience with integrating our solution with various platforms, including those similar to Alloy. We provide dedicated support and resources to ensure a smooth onboarding process, including customized API documentation and on-site training. We also offer a trial period to test our solution with your existing systems, so you can see the benefits firsthand.

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: (objection about price) I'm still not convinced. We're on a tight budget, and I'm not sure we can justify the cost of another solution. What kind of ROI can we expect from DeepData AI, and how does your pricing compare to other solutions on the market?

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: I understand that budget is a concern. Our pricing is competitive, and we've seen our clients achieve significant returns on investment, often within the first 6-12 months. We offer customized pricing plans based on your specific needs and use cases. I'd be happy to discuss this further and provide some case studies from similar clients who have seen positive results.

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: (objection about authority) Okay, I'm intrigued, but I'm not the sole decision-maker on this. I'd need to get buy-in from our risk management team and potentially our CEO. Can you provide some materials or a demo that I can share with them to help build a case for DeepData AI?

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: Absolutely. I can provide a customized demo tailored to your specific use cases and pain points. This will give your team a clear understanding of how DeepData AI can address your current challenges and provide a strong foundation for growth. Would you like to schedule a demo for next week?

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: Alright, let's schedule that demo. I'll make sure to get the right people in the room, and we can discuss further how DeepData AI can support our identity and fraud prevention efforts.

analysis.raw:
Score: 8
Outcome: Success
Key_Objection: Authority
Feedback: The seller should have attempted to uncover more information about the buyer's current pain points and challenges to create a stronger connection and more personalized pitch. Sentiment: Neutral

parsed.feedback: The seller should have attempted to uncover more information about the buyer's current pain points and challenges to create a stronger connection and more personalized pitch. Sentiment: Neutral
